752260.name: Divide & Conquer Demo
752260.description:
You're a walking number, use your everyday math skills in this First Person Thrower (think FPS) to be the biggest and best.

- Collect "power ups" to make yourself bigger.
- Increase yourself while decreasing other walking numbers.
- Become a specific number.

This demo allows the player to get a feel for the game. The full version includes:
- Throw "power downs" at other numbers to make them zero.
- Survive and be the last man standing.
- New worlds.
- Avatar customization.

The other numbers will fight back.
Complete objectives to unlock new levels and worlds. Play for fun or play for education.
The game is very dynamic and it will test your skills no matter how knowledgeable you are.
